required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study of SHR3680 in Combination With Docetaxel in the Treatment of mCRPC
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase II Clinical Study of SHR3680 Combined With Docetaxel in the Treatment of Metastatic Castration-resistant Prostate Cancer Previously Treated With Abiraterone

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this trial is to evaluate SHR3680 combined with Docetaxel to improve Metastatic Castration Resistant Prostate Cancer Patients whether the patient's Time to prostate specific antigen (PSA) progression is superior to SHR3680 or Docetaxel single drug.

primary_outcome.measure: Time to prostate specific antigen (PSA) progression
primary_outcome.description: Time from randomisation to the first time of PSA progression according to the criterion of PCGW3
The type, frequency, severity, timing, seriousness, and relationship to study therapy

secondary_outcome.description: Time from randomisation to radiologically confirmed progressive disease or death due to any cause

The percentage of patients with measureable disease at baseline who achieved a complete or partial response in their soft tissue disease using the Response Evaluation Criteria in Solid Tumors (RECIST) version 1.1 criteria
After the continuous therapy from randomisation to the end of the 12 weeks, the percentage of patients whose levels of PSA decreased by more than 50% compared with baseline
Time from randomisation to death due to any cause
The single dose and multiple dose PK will be calculated as data permits including AUC
The single-dose and multiple dose PK will be calculated as data permits including Cmax
The single-dose and multiple dose PK will be calculated as data permits including Cmin

intervention.description: Participants will receive SHR3680 combined with Docetaxel

facility.name: West China Hospital of Sichuan University
